ygData.subject: Qyenos Merchant that sells tiny daggers?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have traveled for many days and nights, and fought off countless perils to reach the Human city of Qyenos. It it very different than my home city of Ak anon
ygData.messageBody:
I have traveled for many days and nights, and fought off countless perils to reach the Human city of Qyenos. It it very different than my home city of Ak'anon but I find myself drawn to explore and learn. Since I have decided to stay in Qyenos for a while I will need an animation to protect myself from the smelly gnolls. Can any fellow enchanters tell me the location of the merchant in Qyenos that will sell me tiny daggers?

Thanks Kindly

Agergon (Tunare)
